products.title: White Blackout Blind for VELUX ® skylights
products.metadescription: Some would say that this blind is too white. Those people are wrong. Being such a sharp white can only be a good thing, as it allows this blind to work like a dream in those crisp, monochromatic schemes that are so popular in homes around the country.

products.title: Elements Pure White Blackout Blind for VELUX ® Windows
products.metadescription:
You know our motto, Made to Measure, Made Simple. Well, this Elements Pure White blackout blind for your VELUX ® window is as simple as it gets.

Measuring is simple – there isn’t any! Simply give us the window code and we’ll make sure it fits. Fitting is almost as easy, check

products.title: Skye Ultra White (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Skye Ultra White (Blackout) Velux Windows 1992-2001 from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Windows 1992-2001 online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window.  Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit Velux, Rooflite, Keylite, Fakro and Dakstra roof windows.  Offering optimum light control each blind can be positioned effortlessly to sit at any desired point within the side channels.

All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.

Explore the infinite potential of beautiful fabrics and be inspired by the soft styling effects that make this collection refined and original. And due to the Roman blind's specific design, you can easily change the fabric in a matter of minutes. Just pick your choice!

 	Elegant and decorative with soft lighting effects.

products.title: White (1045)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure White (1045) Velux Energy Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Energy Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux energy blinds offers variable blackout and an insulation effect of up to 19%. The double-pleated blackout cloth has an aluminium honeycomb structure within for significantly improved insulation. Energy blinds are not fixed at the top of the bottom, so you can position them exactly where you need them for light control and privacy.

 	Blackout effect.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Improved insulation.
 	Sleek design - no visible cords.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	12 colour choices.

products.title: White (7001)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure White (7001) Velux Venetian Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Venetian Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Low maintenance, moisture resistant Venetian blinds are perfect for bathrooms and kitchens. Their unique cordless design eliminates unsightly hanging cords and allows you to easily tilt the slats in any direction for optimum light adjustment.

 	Perfect for high humidity rooms.
 	Easy to clean.
 	Optimum light adjustment.
 	Preserves your view whole providing privacy.
 	No hanging cords.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	9 colour choices.
